column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My friend loves this place because of its Tapas styled food. The ambience is ok
column2: although I felt the food was overrated and the space is a little crammed. But this place is in high demand and many people frequent it. So like my friend
column3: many people love to visit this place. So if you are into Tapas food
column6: then you like me will not be a huge fan.
